summary: SSH server Dropbear allows privilege escalation (2 minute read) Dropbear SSH server versions through 2024.84 contain CVE-2025-14282 (CVSS 9.8 Critical), which allows privilege escalation to root via Unix socket forwarding. summary: Leaked Prototypes Reveal Apple Once Tested Pink and Yellow AirPods (2 minute read) Newly leaked photos from prototype collector Kosutami show that Apple tested first-generation AirPods in bright pink and yellow, with colored charging cases matching the iPhone 5c palette, while the earbuds remained white.
